Class Pawn

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece

    public class Pawn
extends ChessPiece
    Pawn class that extends ChessPiece to make a pawn with the proper rules/moves the pawn can make

    March 15, 2013
